forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow this morning will taper off and give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 3C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow this morning will taper off and give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 39F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some passing clouds. Low -4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some passing clouds. Low near 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny. High 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 43F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -4C. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 7C. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 31F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 6C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 43F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 31F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 41F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning. A few rain showers in the afternoon - otherwise, mostly cloudy. High around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning. A few rain showers in the afternoon - otherwise, mostly cloudy. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low -2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening. Snow showers late. Low 29F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
